data.comment: The big names in today's match at Schwarzwald-Stadion have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Christian Dingert, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
Christian Dingert awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Freiburg.
In the minute 4, Christian Dingert signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
Bremen needs to be cautious. Freiburg have an attacking throw-in.
Freiburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 6, Freiburg's Lucas Holer gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Bremen have a goal kick.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 9, Nils Petersen (Freiburg) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
Nils Petersen for Freiburg is whistled offside.
In the minute 11, Christian Dingert awards Freiburg a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Christian Dingert.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Bremen at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Goal! Freiburg have got their heads in front thanks to a Philipp Lienhart strike.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the home team in Freiburg.
Christian Dingert signals a throw-in for Freiburg, close to Bremen's area.
In Freiburg, Freiburg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 24, Bremen have been awarded a penalty in Freiburg...
Niclas Fullkrug levels the score at 1-1 from the penalty spot.
Nicolas Hofler (Freiburg) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 32, Bremen have been awarded a corner by Christian Dingert.
In Freiburg, Niclas Fullkrug (Bremen) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Freiburg.
In the minute 35, Roland Sallai for Freiburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Bremen at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Throw-in high up the field for Bremen in Freiburg.
In the minute 37, Freiburg have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Christian Dingert signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
Bremen's Leonardo Bittencourt gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Freiburg defender.
Josh Sargent gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bremen.
In the minute 41, Bremen are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Christian Gunter for Freiburg drives towards goal at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Niclas Fullkrug (Bremen) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Freiburg defenders.
In the minute 44, In Freiburg Freiburg drive forward through Vincenzo Grifo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ludwig Augustinsson is booked for the away team.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Freiburg.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Throw-in for Bremen close to the penalty box.
Bremen make their first substitution with Kevin Mohwald replacing Nick Woltemade.
In the minute 47, Christian Dingert awards Freiburg a goal kick.
In Freiburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Bremen.
In the minute 49, Bremen are pushing forward but Kevin Mohwald's finish is wide of the goal.
Christian Dingert awards Freiburg a goal kick.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 51, Jean-Manuel Mbom (Bremen) has received a yellow card from Christian Dingert.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Freiburg.
Free kick for Freiburg in the half of Bremen.
In the minute 54, Can Freiburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bremen's half?
Christian Dingert signals a free kick to Freiburg.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Freiburg have a goal kick.
Bremen attack but Leonardo Bittencourt's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 64, Bremen have been awarded a corner by Christian Dingert.
Corner awarded to Bremen.
Christian Dingert signals a throw-in for Bremen, close to Freiburg's area.
In the minute 66, Milot Rashica is on a sub for Leonardo Bittencourt for Bremen.
Freiburg's Roland Sallai breaks free at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
In the minute 69, Christian Streich is making the team's first substitution at Schwarzwald-Stadion with Woo-yeong Jeong replacing Roland Sallai.
Chang-Hoon Kwon is replacing Vincenzo Grifo for the home team.
Freiburg are coming forward and Baptiste Santamaria gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 71, Bremen have a goal kick.
Freiburg's Jonathan Schmid gets in a shot on goal at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Bremen.
Ball safe as Bremen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lucas Holer (Freiburg) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Jean-Manuel Mbom with Omer Toprak.
In the minute 77, Bremen make their fourth substitution with Davie Selke replacing Niclas Fullkrug.
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Bremen have been awarded a corner by Christian Dingert.
In the minute 83, Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Christian Dingert signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
Josh Sargent (Bremen) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 85, Freiburg to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
Goal kick for Bremen at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Christian Dingert signals a Freiburg throw-in in Bremen's half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Christian Gross is replacing Kevin Mohwald for the away team.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 89, Freiburg's Baptiste Santamaria has been booked in Freiburg.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Bremen.
Christian Dingert signals a free kick to Freiburg.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Freiburg.
At Schwarzwald-Stadion the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Christian Dingert awards Bremen a goal kick.
That's full-time at Schwarzwald-Stadion. The final score is 1-1.
The home team have replaced Lucas Holer with Ermedin Demirovic. This is the third substitution made today by Christian Streich.
Jonathan Schmid (Freiburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
